Package by.bsuir.mycoolstore.controller

Class AdminController

java.lang.Object
by.bsuir.mycoolstore.controller.AdminController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/Admin/") public class AdminController extends Object
The AdminController class handles the administrative operations for the application.

    • addFilm

      @PostMapping(value="AddFilm", consumes="multipart/form-data") public String addFilm(@ModelAttribute("film") FilmEntity film, @RequestPart("filmFile") org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile filmFile, @RequestPart("trailerFile") org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile trailerFile, @RequestParam("filmCategory") List<Long> categories)
      Handles the POST request for adding a film.
      Parameters:
      film - The film entity to add.
      filmFile - The film file to upload.
      trailerFile - The trailer file to upload.
      categories - The list of category IDs for the film.
      Returns:
      The redirect URL after adding the film.

    • ban

      @PostMapping("Ban") public String ban(@RequestParam("authorId") Long userId, @SessionAttribute("userID") Long adminId)
      Handles the POST request for banning a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user to ban.
      adminId - The ID of the admin performing the ban.
      Returns:
      The redirect URL after banning the user.
